page.title: 19HUMBERSTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Parish Council consists of twelve members who are concerned with local affairs. Some members serve on the Governing Bodies of local schools. One councillor is a member of one Road Safety Committee. The business of the parish council is often mundane but occasionally issues arise which arouse public interest. In 1985 a plan was put forward to establish a Private Nursing Home in a residential road. This was bitterly opposed. The parish council was deeply involved in representing the views of the village. There is,also,divided opinion about the extension of Wendover Hall,much used by local groups. The re-establishment of the Village Horticultural Show has highlighted the need for larger premises. The parish council are involved in this issue.
